Title: Linear - LNR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Incorporate charm, texture, and versatility into any space with the lovely Linear LNR-01 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This delightful area rug is hand-tufted in India by master artisans, giving it an expertly crafted and intricately detailed look.
  • Blending contemporary design with eye-catching detail, this abstract area rug balances dimension and modern flair. Choose between multiple color options to complement your space beautifully.
  • Featuring a cut and loop pile, this high-low texture area rug brings instant depth and dimension to your home. The wool and rayon rug also features a cotton backing for added durability.
  • This rug should be spot cleaned and vacuumed on low. Professional cleaning is recommended, and we advise against using a vacuum beater bar on this elegant rug.

Title: Lowland - Quadrant Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The simple, chic look of our Calvin Klein Home Lowland Quadrant rug easily complements a wide range of settings, bringing a rich texture of handwoven fibers that are both soft and long-lasting.

  • Handwoven by artisans, each rug from this Calvin Klein collection is crafted of a mix of soft natural and synthetic materials.
  • This neutral-hued casual floor covering adds depth, dimension, and timeless appeal to any space, from a contemporary entryway to a traditional dining room.
  • Enjoy a wonderful texture underfoot with this indoor area rug's high pile height of handwoven wool, polyester, cotton, and rayon.
  • Avoid placing your rug in direct sunlight as this can cause premature fading and weaken fibers.

Title: Lunar - Luminescent Rib Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The rich look and feel of our Calvin Klein Home Lunar Luminescent Rib rug is due to its hand-loomed construction of silky, shiny viscose yarns. Its simple appearance also allows it to thrive in a wide variety of settings.

  • Featuring a silk-like feel and hand-loomed construction, this floor covering from Calvin Klein offers modern elegance underfoot.
  • Enjoy a simple-yet-versatile look with this casual piece, which will function just as beautifully in a modern loft as a classic living room.
  • With a medium pile of shiny viscose, our hand-loomed area rug delivers a lustrous look and soft feel to any space.
  • Avoid excess humidity as this can cause your rug to weaken over time.

Title: Mesa - MSA-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Boasting a modern aesthetic courtesy of its casual look and neutral hue, our Calvin Klein Home Mesa MSA-01 rug is meticulously handwoven of jute and rayon by artisans for remarkable texture.

  • A blend of eco-friendly jute and rayon fibers is handwoven to give this piece from Calvin Klein natural comfort and strength.
  • With earthy neutrals and a casual attitude, this simple floor covering is versatile enough to be placed in a contemporary office, traditional bedroom, and more.
  • By handweaving this casual indoor rug from jute and rayon in a medium pile, we gave it a soft surface and inherent resilience.
  • Do not place your rug in direct sunlight because this will make it fade over time.

Boasting a modern aesthetic courtesy of its casual look and neutral hue, our Calvin Klein Home Mesa MSA-01 rug is meticulously handwoven of jute and rayon by artisans for remarkable texture.

  • A blend of eco-friendly jute and rayon fibers is handwoven to give this piece from Calvin Klein natural comfort and strength.
  • With earthy neutrals and a casual attitude, this simple floor covering is versatile enough to be placed in a contemporary office, traditional bedroom, and more.
  • By handweaving this casual indoor rug from jute and rayon in a medium pile, we gave it a soft surface and inherent resilience.
  • Do not place your rug in direct sunlight because this will make it fade over time.

Title: Rush - CK-953 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Lend visual and tactile texture to your favorite interior spaces with the tastefully composed CK-953 area rug from Calvin Klein Home. This versatile design is part of the performance-focused Rush collection, a series of adaptable rugs made to bring chic modern style to your most demanding placements.

  • Each area rug in the Rush collection is made from clever synthetics that resist staining and wear for true family-friendly appeal.
  • A stippled pattern adorns the surface of this contemporary rug design, a natural fit for decor themes ranging from minimalist modern to industrial chic. The grey and ivory coloration allows for endless coordination possibilities.
  • Rush collection rugs are power loomed from polypropylene and polyester yarns worked into a high-low pile. The edges are serged to prevent fraying and the back is finished in jute for excellent stability.
  • Blot spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Rotate annually to prevent wear patterns from developing over time.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Each area rug in the Rush collection is made from clever synthetics that resist staining and wear for true family-friendly appeal.
  • A stippled pattern adorns the surface of this contemporary rug design, a natural fit for decor themes ranging from minimalist modern to industrial chic. The grey and ivory coloration allows for endless coordination possibilities.
  • Rush collection rugs are power loomed from polypropylene and polyester yarns worked into a high-low pile. The edges are serged to prevent fraying and the back is finished in jute for excellent stability.
  • Blot spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Rotate annually to prevent wear patterns from developing over time.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Surfaces - SFC-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold texture statement anywhere in the home with the innovative Surfaces collection from Calvin Klein Home, a series that reimagines classic shag with smart contemporary patterns. The handsome Surfaces SFC-01 area rug is carved with a smooth linear pattern that weaves its way from side to side.

  • Surfaces is a collection that makes indulgent comfort more accessible than ever. These rugs are made using smart synthetic materials that clean up easily for true family-friendly functionality.
  • This contemporary shag is available in a variety of simple solid colorways. The pattern is expressed in the peaks and valleys of the high-low pile construction to achieve a clever balance of artistry and minimalism.
  • Ultra soft 100% polyester rug pile makes these rugs a treat for relaxing placements while easily standing up to casual everyday wear. Each one resists staining and fading for long-lasting style in any setting.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment to keep the pile looking its best.

Title: Lunar - Luminescent Rib Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The rich look and feel of our Calvin Klein Home Lunar Luminescent Rib rug is due to its hand-loomed construction of silky, shiny viscose yarns. Its simple appearance also allows it to thrive in a wide variety of settings.

  • Featuring a silk-like feel and hand-loomed construction, this floor covering from Calvin Klein offers modern elegance underfoot.
  • Enjoy a simple-yet-versatile look with this casual piece, which will function just as beautifully in a modern loft as a classic living room.
  • With a medium pile of shiny viscose, our hand-loomed area rug delivers a lustrous look and soft feel to any space.
  • Avoid excess humidity as this can cause your rug to weaken over time.

Title: Launder Washables - LDR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soft hues sweep across the Launder LDR-01 area rug, its pattern rendered with soft tonality reminiscent of watercolor on canvas. This adaptable accent is a fully washable design from Calvin Klein Home, its low-maintenance appeal perfect for active family environments.

  • Launder is available in a variety of calming colorways. Each one features a rich palette that makes coordination a breeze.
  • This flatwoven abstract area rug is perfect for active environments that experience higher levels of foot traffic. Use beneath a dining table, at the entryway, or use to underscore an active kid's bedroom or playroom.
  • Each blended area rug in the Launder collection is power-loomed from a combination of polyester and cotton. The pile resists shedding for effortless upkeep. The flatwoven surface cleans up easily between washes.
  • This rug is machine washable using a cold water setting and mild detergent. Hang to dry.

Soft hues sweep across the Launder LDR-01 area rug, its pattern rendered with soft tonality reminiscent of watercolor on canvas. This adaptable accent is a fully washable design from Calvin Klein Home, its low-maintenance appeal perfect for active family environments.

  • Launder is available in a variety of calming colorways. Each one features a rich palette that makes coordination a breeze.
  • This flatwoven abstract area rug is perfect for active environments that experience higher levels of foot traffic. Use beneath a dining table, at the entryway, or use to underscore an active kid's bedroom or playroom.
  • Each blended area rug in the Launder collection is power-loomed from a combination of polyester and cotton. The pile resists shedding for effortless upkeep. The flatwoven surface cleans up easily between washes.
  • This rug is machine washable using a cold water setting and mild detergent. Hang to dry.

Title: Prairie Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Practicality and rustic comfort mingle beautifully to create our Calvin Klein Home Prairie Prairie rug, which is handcrafted of real cowhide. It's incredibly resilient yet exceptionally soft as well.

  • Handcrafted of 100% cowhide by artisans for superior performance, this unique rug from Calvin Klein is ideally suited for high-traffic spaces.
  • From rustic living rooms to contemporary bedrooms, the subtle differences in color allow this Southwestern floor covering too effortlessly blend into a wide array of settings.
  • Our cowhide area rug is masterfully handcrafted by artisans into a durable low profile.
  • Consistent vacuuming is the best and easiest way to keep rug fibers strong and healthy.

Title: River Flow - RFV-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Cool tones and contemporary charm abound from the beautiful River Flow RFV-02 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This chic area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • With its teal, blue, and ivory color scheme and its abstract patterns, this modern area rug is undeniably captivating, yet surprisingly easy to incorporate into your home.
  • This easy-clean, low shed, 100% polypropylene area rug is equal parts well-made and versatile. Complete with a latex backing, this flat pile area rug is sure to make a smart addition to any space.
  • Using professional cleaning solutions for stain removal will keep your rug looking fresh and stain-free for years to come, but we also recommend professional cleanings on a regular basis.

Title: Irradiant - IRR-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Elevate your interior design aesthetic with the exquisite Irradiant IRR-02 Area Rug from Calvin Klein Collection by Nourison.

  • Boasting a concentric, linear pattern in tonal ivory hues, this modern area rug invites you to explore the delicate dance of light and shadow.
  • This low pile area rug is sure to be a smart addition to any high-traffic area, pet-friendly space, or kid-friendly home. The 100% polyester area rug is as practical and low-maintenance as it is soft and supple.
  • This sophisticated area rug is machine-made in Egypt with quality and durability as top priorities.
  • Regular vacuuming will keep stains from setting in, and routine professional cleanings will maintain your fine rug long-term.

Title: Volcanic - VLC-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With help from the beautiful textures of the Volcanic VLC-01 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line, your contemporary design aesthetic will be effortlessly complemented.

  • This stunningly stylish area rug is carefully hand-loomed in India.
  • Equal parts minimalist and chic, this modern area rug is incredibly versatile and undeniably lovely. Choose between four gorgeous color options to tie your space together instantly.
  • This low, loop pile area rug boasts high-low waffle textures for a luxurious look. The 100% wool rug is durable and refined.
  • Vacuum away dried soiling and staining, and arrange for professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug looking clean and fresh.

Title: Rush - CK-955 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Set a cool, contemporary scene in any room with the Rush CK-955 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison as the foundation.

  • Boasting neutral shades of gray and cream, this abstract area rug is unique, charming, and completely artistic. Like a painting for your floor, the modern area rug is breathtaking and bold.
  • This chic, high-low pile area rug is a durable, low-maintenance choice for any space. The polyester and polypropylene area rug is beautifully-textured and thoughtfully-made.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.
  • This chic area rug promises quality and durability. It is expertly machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Halo - HAL-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add some intrigue to your contemporary design aesthetic with the Halo HAL-01 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This exquisite area rug is hand-loomed in India, giving it intricate detail and optimal quality.
  • Blending minimalism, classic design elements, and modern charm, this striped area rug offers a tonal, space-dyed appearance. It's available in a variety of breathtaking color options, so you're sure to find a hue that suits your space beautifully.
  • The low pile, 100% wool area rug with a cotton backing is a durable and elevated choice for any room of your well-decorated home.
  • Spot cleaning and a low-powered vacuum will keep your rug looking beautiful and clean. Professional cleaning is recommended for any tough stains, or for a routine refresh.

Title: Sculptural - SCL-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create a chic, contemporary aesthetic with help from the stunning Sculptural SCL-01 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • Brilliant artisans in India have carefully and meticulously hand-tufted this gorgeous area rug.
  • Showcasing a unique, weathered stone-inspired pattern, this modern area rug combines abstract charm with contemporary flair for a completely captivating vibe. Choose between four equally adaptable hues to give your well-appointed home a coordinated touch.
  • This 100% wool area rug offers a cotton backing for durability. The high-low pile rug is versatile, sophisticated, and intriguing.
  • Remove dry staining and soiling with a vacuum, and schedule professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug beautiful and clean.

Title: Irradiant - IRR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring texture and depth to any space effortlessly with the intriguing Irradiant IRR-01 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • This captivating, modern area rug boasts an overlapping linear pattern that brings abstract, artistic charm to your home. Available in three colorway options, this rug is sure to provide the perfect amount of dimension.
  • Boasting subtle texture variations, this medium pile area rug is commanding and captivating. The 100% polyester area rug is also a low-maintenance and durable choice for any space.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.
  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.

Title: Rush - CK-950 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Stunning texture brings the Rush CK-950 area rug to life. This selection from Calvin Klein Home starts with tonal simplicity, immediately elevated by the striking high-low pile design.

  • Raised lines stretch and intersect, a crosshatched pattern that casts a drama of light and shadow across the surface. This contemporary area rug offers a dynamic viewing experience from every angle.
  • Machine-made from polyester and polypropylene over a sturdy jute backing, this synthetic area rug provides a practical approach to everyday luxury. You can depend on this design to provide years of enjoyment with proper care.
  • Vacuum regularly with the brush roll component disengaged. Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have time to set.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Stunning texture brings the Rush CK-950 area rug to life. This selection from Calvin Klein Home starts with tonal simplicity, immediately elevated by the striking high-low pile design.

  • Raised lines stretch and intersect, a crosshatched pattern that casts a drama of light and shadow across the surface. This contemporary area rug offers a dynamic viewing experience from every angle.
  • Machine-made from polyester and polypropylene over a sturdy jute backing, this synthetic area rug provides a practical approach to everyday luxury. You can depend on this design to provide years of enjoyment with proper care.
  • Vacuum regularly with the brush roll component disengaged. Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have time to set.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Enchanting - ECH-06 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Update your space with contemporary charm using the Enchanting ECH-06 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This effortlessly chic area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Boasting subtle pops of rust against neutral ivories and grays, this abstract, modern area rug is a gorgeous way to update your favorite room.
  • This high-low cut pile rug makes it simple to add texture and depth to your home. The low-shed, easy-care polypropylene and polyester area rug has a durable jute backing and is designed for versatility.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.

Title: Rush - CK-956 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold and unique choice for your one-of-a-kind home with the Rush CK-956 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • In shades of ivory and gray, this modern area rug is neutral, yet completely unexpected. An abstract pattern gives this rug an artistic and contemporary vibe, making it the perfect choice for any chic space.
  • This stunning polyester and polypropylene area rug is carefully-made and gorgeously textured. The lovely, high-low pile area rug is low-maintenance and durable.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.
  • This high-quality, durable area rug is expertly machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Enchanting - ECH-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspire a unique, contemporary design scheme with the Enchanting ECH-03 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This gorgeous area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality in mind.
  • With its abstract pattern and neutral shades of gray and beige, this modern area rug is intriguing, yet undeniably versatile.
  • Featuring a durable jute backing, this easy-care, low-shed, polypropylene and polyester area rug is a smart choice for nearly any space. The high-low cut pile rug adds effortless depth and dimension to your interior design scheme.
  • To extend the life of your rug and keep it looking as pristine as new, we recommend regularly-scheduled professional cleaning.

Title: Rush - CK-952 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a stylish abstract design statement with the Rush CK-952 area rug from Calvin Klein Home. This adaptable interior accent is made with ultra-soft synthetic materials that are easy to maintain and even easier to enjoy, the minimalist theme simple to coordinate with your existing decor.

  • Rush collection rugs are made with family-friendly design in mind. Each one is made from a smart blend of modern synthetics that readily resist staining and wear.
  • A crosshatch pattern adorns the surface of this contemporary area rug, stretching from edge to edge unbound by borders for flexible placement possibilities.
  • This blended synthetic rug is power loomed from a combination of polypropylene and polyester worked into a plush medium-height pile for easy everyday upkeep.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have a chance to set. Rotate annually. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • A crosshatch pattern adorns the surface of this contemporary area rug, stretching from edge to edge unbound by borders for flexible placement possibilities.
  • This blended synthetic rug is power loomed from a combination of polypropylene and polyester worked into a plush medium-height pile for easy everyday upkeep.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have a chance to set. Rotate annually. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Infinity - IFN-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Complete the artistic, contemporary aesthetic in your stylish space with the Infinity IFN-02 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • In calming ivory, blue, and gray hues, this modern area rug is versatile, yet captivating. An artistic, abstract pattern gives the rug all the charm and flair your space has been missing.
  • This lovely polyester and polypropylene area rug is an excellent way to transform any space. The easy-clean, low pile area rug boasts an eye-catching design and breathtaking textures.
  • Remove dry staining and soiling with a vacuum, and schedule professional cleanings on a regular basis to keep your rug beautiful and clean.
  • This chic area rug is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Rush - CK-951 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Cloudy coloration meets striking textural drama with the Rush CK-951 area rug by Calvin Klein Home. This design presents a relaxing aesthetic that beckons the touch, an interactive piece of artwork for the home.

  • High-low pile brings dimension to this area rug, with visual depth that you can see and feel.
  • Use this contemporary area rug to bring a dash of texture to your favorite spaces. The edge-to-edge design opens a range of placement possibilities - use beneath a dining table, to center a seating arrangement, or to accent an active hallway or foyer.
  • CK-951 is power-loomed from a combination of sturdy synthetic rug fibers over a strong jute backing. Both the polypropylene and polyester fibers are easy to clean and maintain for lasting appeal.
  • Quickly blot away spills with a dry white cloth before they have a chance to set.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

  • Use this contemporary area rug to bring a dash of texture to your favorite spaces. The edge-to-edge design opens a range of placement possibilities - use beneath a dining table, to center a seating arrangement, or to accent an active hallway or foyer.
  • CK-951 is power-loomed from a combination of sturdy synthetic rug fibers over a strong jute backing. Both the polypropylene and polyester fibers are easy to clean and maintain for lasting appeal.
  • Quickly blot away spills with a dry white cloth before they have a chance to set.
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Gradient - GDT-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether you value style or comfort, you'll enjoy both with our Calvin Klein Home Gradient GDT-01 rug. Shiny viscose and soft wool yarns are handwoven by talented artisans into a beautiful, transitional design on this versatile piece.

  • Handwoven by master artisans, this collection from Calvin Klein boasts an amazing feel underfoot courtesy of viscose and wool fibers.
  • Understated sophistication abounds from this granite-hued transitional piece, which can form a beautiful base in your dining room, office, or foyer.
  • Skillfully handwoven by artisans into a high pile of viscose and wool, this chic indoor rug is both soft and lustrous.
  • Consistent vacuuming every week is the easiest way to maintain a healthy rug with strong fibers.

Title: Infinity - IFN-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Put your unique personality on proud display with the striking Infinity IFN-05 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.
  • Reminiscent of a cloudy sky, this abstract, modern area rug is as unique as it is versatile. Cool pops of blue provide the perfect contrast to the neutral ivory and gray hues.
  • This polypropylene and polyester area rug with a latex backing is both durable and easy to clean. The flat pile rug will add functionality and undeniable flair to your home.
  • To keep your fine rug as fabulous and fresh as possible, we recommend professional cleaning on a routine basis.

Title: Vapor - CK-971 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Dense textures make the CK-971 area rug an especially engaging way to underscore your favorite interior spaces. This piece is part of the luxurious Vapor collection from Calvin Klein Home, a series that delights with ultra-soft fibers for alluring comfort you'll look forward to enjoying in your most relaxing placements.

  • CK-971 features a hatched pattern that varies in concentration, creating an illusion of rich shadows and luminous pools of light. High-low pile construction underscores each line.
  • This gorgeous contemporary rug features a neutral greyscale palette that opens the door for endless coordination possibilities. Use to flatter interior themes like modern minimalist, Scandinavian hygge, and industrial.
  • Each area rug in the Vapor collection is power loomed from an innovative blend of resilient polyester and silky-smooth viscose. The pile is cropped to a medium height for easier everyday upkeep.
  • Place in a dry environment. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Professional cleaning is recommended.

Title: Enchanting - ECH-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Oversized botanical patterns lend a sense of irresistible whimsy to the Enchanting ECH-01 area rug from Calvin Klein Home. This uplifting interior accent enjoys an ornamental aesthetic rendered in ultra-soft pile, a satisfying treat for all the senses.

  • Smart synthetic construction makes each Enchanting collection area rug highly resistant against common sources of staining and wear for great family-friendly functionality.
  • Choose from two adaptable colorways, each one featuring abstract floral rug patterns over a neutral field that allows for easy coordination. High-low pile construction lends ethereal dimension to the surface.
  • Enchanting collection synthetic rugs are power-loomed from a practical combination of polyester and polypropylene over a sturdy jute backing. All edges are serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic placements.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Blot spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Rotate annually to prevent wear patterns from developing over time.

  • Choose from two adaptable colorways, each one featuring abstract floral rug patterns over a neutral field that allows for easy coordination. High-low pile construction lends ethereal dimension to the surface.
  • Enchanting collection synthetic rugs are power-loomed from a practical combination of polyester and polypropylene over a sturdy jute backing. All edges are serged to prevent fraying in high-traffic placements.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Blot spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Rotate annually to prevent wear patterns from developing over time.

Title: Balance - BLN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold geometric statement in any room with the wonderfully soft and practical Balance BLN-01 area rug from the Calvin Klein Home collection. This exciting interior accent features a crisp striped pattern worked into a mosaic layout, with every detail emphasized by a carved texture.

  • Balance collection area rugs provide luxurious comfort with family-friendly appeal. Each one resists staining and fading while providing excellent performance in spaces that experience higher levels of foot traffic.
  • Choose from three adaptable colorways, each one easy to coordinate. This borderless contemporary rug offers endless possibilities for creative placement potential – use to anchor a living space, to underscore a dining table, to frame a bed, and more.
  • Each area rug in the Balance collection is power-loomed from a resilient combination of polypropylene and polyester yarns. This strong synthetic rug is backed with latex for added stability. Every edge is serged to prevent fraying.
  • Quickly blot away spills before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Ravine - RAV-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Discover the refreshing look and feel that occurs when comfort and style are in perfect harmony on our Calvin Klein Home Ravine RAV-01 rug. With a hand-tufted construction of rayon and wool and textured solid design, this piece has limitless versatility.

  • The natural and synthetic yarns that comprise this rug from Calvin Klein are hand-tufted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques.
  • With subtle striations in neutral tones, this textured solid piece has the versatility to complement traditional, modern, or global spaces.
  • Rayon and wool are hand-tufted by artisans into a plush pile height, giving this indoor rug a remarkably soft feel.
  • When placing your rug, void direct sunlight because this can make your rug fade more quickly than it normally would.

Title: Balian - CK-56 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the exciting Balian collection, Calvin Klein Home introduces a series of sophisticated abstract area rugs made with a sumptuously comfortable hand. The beautiful CK-56 area rug makes a dynamic impression with patterns that eddy and swirl across the surface, inviting the eye to dance throughout its intricate details.

  • Alluring underfoot comfort makes this collection stand out. The thick pile features impressive density to provide a soft and supportive underfoot experience well-suited for your most indulgent interior settings.
  • Marbled patterns wash across the surface of this contemporary rug, unbound by borders for flexible placement possibilities. A silvery greyscale color theme ensures easy coordination with modern decor palettes.
  • Balian collection blended rugs are power loomed from a combination of resilient acrylic yarns and silky viscose threads. These materials lend a radiant shimmer for luminous high-end appeal.
  • Place in a dry environment. Blot spills quickly using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Rotate annually.

Title: Irradiant - IRR-04 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Refresh your space with the neutral and sophisticated Irradiant IRR-04 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • Boasting a clean silver and gray color palette and abstract, rippling, marbled details, this shimmering rug is an effortless way to bring artistic flair to your home.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is a durable, low-maintenance option for your busy lifestyle. Subtle texture variations give this medium pile area rug a captivating and commanding look.
  • To extend the life of your rug and keep it looking as pristine as new, we recommend regularly-scheduled professional cleaning.
  • This effortlessly-chic, modern area rug is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Currents - CUR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Effortless comfort is yours to enjoy with the ultra-versatile Currents collection from Calvin Klein Home. The handsome Currents CUR-01 area rug keeps things simple with a stylish contemporary pattern rendered in wonderfully adaptable colorways, all expressed in durable materials that can keep up with the most active families.

  • Currents is a collection that shines with easy-upkeep appeal. These rugs resist staining and fading while the low pile ensures that everyday cleanup is a breeze.
  • This modern abstract area rug features a simple crosshatched pattern sure to lend tremendous visual texture to any room. These rugs are soft enough for bedrooms and durable enough for living spaces.
  • Power-loomed construction achieves fantastic yarn density at an approachable value. This piece features a 100% polypropylene rug pile with cut fibers for an exquisitely touchable surface.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills. When vacuuming, make sure the beater bar component is disengaged.

Title: Linear Glow - GLO-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Our Calvin Klein Home Linear Glow GLO-01 area rug is skillfully hand-loomed of pure wool, granting it an incredibly soft feel underfoot. Even better, its simple-yet-striking design is highly versatile.

  • Enjoy a cloud-like surface every day with the hand-loomed wool surface of this plush rug from Calvin Klein.
  • Capable of complementing traditional, contemporary, and other styles, this transitional piece offers a beautiful base thanks to its simple, striated design.
  • Our hand-loomed wool rug is crafted into a high pile by artisans, so it has an incredibly soft feel.
  • Rotate your rug every couple of months to alleviate repeated wear and tear only on certain areas.

Title: Vapor - CK-970 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Treat yourself to indulgent comfort with the Vapor CK-970 area rug from Calvin Klein Home, a sophisticated interior accent made with a textural high-low pile with a silky touch. This luminescent design features a neutral palette for easy coordination.

  • A subtle hatched pattern decorates the surface of this abstract rug design, the lines emphasized by carved detailing for a bold and dimensional appearance.
  • Use this contemporary rug to elevate interior themes that lean minimalist or industrial. Use to complement quiet interior spaces like bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and more.
  • Vapor is a blended area rug collection made with silky viscose and resilient polyester. The short pile enjoys a radiant sheen that comes to life beneath the light. Power-loomed construction ensures consistency.
  • Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth. Professional cleaning is recommended.

Title: Balance - BLN-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Criss-crossing lines lend a tremendous sense of energy to the Balance BLN-02 area rug, an exciting Calvin Klein Home design with endless decorative potential to explore. This luxurious interior accent is made to perform in any setting – it's crafted from strong synthetics that stand up to wear while providing exquisitely soft comfort underfoot.

  • Balance BLN-02 is available in three eye-catching colorways, each one featuring white linear patterns over a solid base.
  • High-low pile construction emphasizes each line with dimensional valleys. Use to bring a sense of large-scale texture and pattern to your favorite interior placements throughout the home.
  • This synthetic rug is made from a combination of polypropylene and polyester, both materials highly resistant against staining for true family-friendly appeal. Latex backing provides added stability.
  • Balance collection rugs are low-shedding and easy to clean. Simply blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth and vacuum regularly using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.

Title: Maya - Etched Light Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Shiny and soft, our Calvin Klein Home Maya Etched Light rug boasts an artistic aesthetic that can be either casual or formal, depending on where you place it. Crafted with a blend of viscose and wool, this piece is sure to be a favorite for years.

  • Enjoy the luminous quality of this rug from Calvin Klein that comes from its silky viscose blended with comfy wool.
  • Mineral-inspired tones and a versatile, transitional design with crisscrossing lines make this chic floor covering the perfect accent for your bedroom, office, or laundry room.
  • Our power-loomed area rug has a high pile of viscose and wool yarns for incredible comfort underfoot.
  • Rotate your rug on occasion to even out the effects of repeated foot traffic to certain areas.

Title: Balian - CK-54 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Layered, textural, and beautifully nuanced, the handsome Balian CK-54 area rug is a statement-making accent with so much to offer any contemporary decor theme. This exquisitely crafted rug from Calvin Klein Home catches the eye and beckons the touch with thoughtful design in every detail.

  • Balian rugs are made with a short yet dense pile that feels luxurious underfoot while remaining simple to maintain. Low clearance allows for placement near doors.
  • This contemporary rug design features crisp striations that crisscross over the surface, the pattern stretching from edge to edge. The blue and grey palette makes coordination a breeze.
  • Each area rug in the Balian collection is made with a blend of acrylic and silky viscose for an opulent tactile experience. These blended rugs are power loomed for precision and consistency across the collection.
  • Prevent prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Rotate annually, or more often if placed within the path of moderate foot traffic.

  • In sand, cream, and gray hues, this modern area rug is easy to incorporate into any space - but it's also surprisingly unique. The abstract rug offers painterly designs and floral stem-style art for a captivating look.
  • This chic, high-low pile area rug is a durable, low-maintenance choice for any space. The polyester and polypropylene area rug is beautifully-textured and thoughtfully-made.
  • Using professional cleaning solutions for stain removal will keep your rug looking fresh and stain-free for years to come, but we also recommend professional cleanings on a regular basis.
  • This stylish area rug promises quality and durability, and it is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Infinity - IFN-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Details and drama make the Infinity IFN-03 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line a brilliant addition to your contemporary home.

  • This well-made area rug is machine-made in Turkey, adhering to strict durability standards.
  • Boasting a geometric pattern, faded details, and shades of ivory, gray, and blue, this abstract area rug is sure to provide an unbeatable, modern foundation in your favorite room.
  • This polypropylene and polyester area rug has a latex backing and is both durable and simple to clean. The flat pile rug is sure to complete your space with practicality and style.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.

Go for a bold and breathtaking look in your favorite space with the River Flow RFV-01 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This stylish area rug promises quality and durability, and it is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Offering rich tones and captivating textures, this modern area rug is a true head-turner. Bursting with abstract charm and available in two color combination options, this rug provides the perfect backdrop for any contemporary design scheme.
  • This flat pile area rug offers a durable latex backing. The low shed, easy-clean, 100% polypropylene rug is versatile and well-made.

Title: Balian - CK-55 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The striking Balian CK-55 area rug features an energetic burst of linear patterns, sure to capture the eye from across any room. This exciting interior accent from Calvin Klein Home commands attention and beckons tactile exploration – a satisfying treat for the senses.

  • Dense pile makes the Balian collection especially comfortable and supportive underfoot. Low-profile design means that these rugs can be placed near doors.
  • Black and silvery greyscale coloration allow this abstract area rug to coordinate easily with any modern neutral-leaning palettes. Use to complement interior themes like minimalist, industrial, and more.
  • Made from a combination of acrylic and viscose, Balian collection rugs enjoy silky softness and a luminous sheen. These blended rugs are power loomed with a short pile and a durable latex backing.
  • Viscose rugs perform their best when placed in dry environments with moderate foot traffic. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Balian - CK-53 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The eye-catching Balian CK-53 area rug is adorned with sweeping striations that curve, fold, and bend with a striking sense of motion – sure to add a dynamic visual element to any interior decor theme. This beautiful accent from Calvin Klein Home makes an artistic statement while satisfying with truly luxurious comfort.

  • Simple greyscale palettes make Balian collection area rugs especially simple to coordinate. Use to complement themes like contemporary, minimalist, industrial, and more.
  • This gorgeous abstract rug would make an atmospheric addition to intimate living areas and modern bedroom environments. The low pile allows for excellent clearance when placed near doors.
  • Balian collection blended rugs are made with a combination of resilient acrylic and silky viscose threads. Each one is machine loomed and resistant against shedding. Latex backing adds stability.
  • Avoid contact with moisture. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Enchanting - ECH-02 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Lend an artistic touch to your favorite interior spaces with the effortlessly elegant ECH-02 area rug from the Enchanting collection by Calvin Klein Home. This whimsical interior accent features an upscaled brushstroke pattern that abounds with relaxing vibes, perfect for your most cherished retreats.

  • Resilient synthetic materials make this collection perfectly family-friendly. Enchanting collection rugs are resistant against staining, fading, and wear for long-lasting appeal in your most demanding placements.
  • Enchanting ECH-02 is available in two colorways, one geared toward cool interior themes and the other toward warmer palettes. Use to underscore dining tables, to unify living rooms, to soften bedroom floors, and more.
  • This smart synthetic area rug is made from a combination of resilient polyester and polypropylene. Power-loomed construction lends excellent consistency and value to the collection. Serged edges prevent fraying.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills upon noticing. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Loom Select Neutrals - Pasture Area Rug
Body (HTML): Woven from the highest quality 100% New Zealand wool yarns in a neutral palette, these area rugs offer an exceptionally dense and subtle texture. The sophisticated styling combined with accents of hand carving creates this unique collection.

Title: Maya - Delta Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the subtle glow of our Calvin Klein Home Maya Delta rug, which comes from its unique blend of shiny viscose and comfy wool. Even better, its subdued stripe pattern offers classic good looks to any space.

  • This rug from Calvin Klein boasts a mix of comfort and luxury courtesy of its viscose and wool construction.
  • Featuring a subtle stripe design for understated sophistication, this chic, textured piece adds simple style to your breakfast nook, study, or bedroom.
  • Silky viscose and soft wool are power-loomed to create the soft surface of our stylish indoor rug.
  • Occasionally rotating your floor mat will help it last longer and maintain even wear in all areas.

Title: Maya - Labradorite Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With modern sensibilities and vintage influence, our Calvin Klein Home Maya Labradorite rug is a talented floor covering that thrives beside any style, especially because of its plush viscose and wool construction.

  • New Zealand wool and shiny, silk-like viscose gran this collection from Calvin Klein a remarkably soft feel.
  • Inspired by vintage designs yet just as at home in contemporary spaces, our traditional-meets-modern beauty has the versatility to go anywhere in your home.
  • Masterfully power-loomed into a high pile of viscose and wool, this lustrous area rug feels exceptionally soft underfoot.
  • To clean light spills or stains on area rugs, simply clean with a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.

Title: Balian - CK-52 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Slender striations waver and swirl across the surface of the Balian CK-52 area rug, a sophisticated interior accent that can lend a brilliant sense of texture and movement to any interior theme. This attractive design from Calvin Klein Home utilizes advanced construction techniques to achieve exquisite comfort balanced with clean aesthetic appeal.

  • Balian rugs feature an exceptionally dense pile that makes the carved details stand out even stronger. These pieces provide an alluring underfoot experience well-suited to your most luxurious placements.
  • A greyscale palette makes this abstract rug even easier to incorporate within modern-leaning decor themes. Both warm and cool undertones can be found woven throughout for easy coordination.
  • Power loomed construction is used to achieve ultra-fine detail. Balian collection blended rugs are made with a combination of durable acrylic and silky viscose, fibers that give the surface a radiant sheen.
  • Viscose content rugs perform their best in dry environments. Quickly blot away any spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Do not use a beater bar component when vacuuming.

Title: River Flow - RFV-03 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Tie your timeless, romantic space together with the soft, yet contemporary River Flow RFV-03 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This high-quality, durable area rug is expertly machine-made in Turkey.
  • Featuring a bold botanical pattern against a textured backdrop, this floral area rug is inspired by nature, yet grounded in modern charm. Available in two lovely color schemes, this carpet is sure to complement your timeless interior design scheme.
  • This flat pile area rug offers a durable latex backing. The low shed, easy-clean, 100% polypropylene rug is versatile and well-made.
  • To keep your gorgeous rug looking fresh between professional cleanings, spot cleaning with a white cloth is recommended.

Title: Balance - BLN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold geometric statement in any room with the wonderfully soft and practical Balance BLN-01 area rug from the Calvin Klein Home collection. This exciting interior accent features a crisp striped pattern worked into a mosaic layout, with every detail emphasized by a carved texture.

  • Balance collection area rugs provide luxurious comfort with family-friendly appeal. Each one resists staining and fading while providing excellent performance in spaces that experience higher levels of foot traffic.
  • Choose from three adaptable colorways, each one easy to coordinate. This borderless contemporary rug offers endless possibilities for creative placement potential – use to anchor a living space, to underscore a dining table, to frame a bed, and more.
  • Each area rug in the Balance collection is power-loomed from a resilient combination of polypropylene and polyester yarns. This strong synthetic rug is backed with latex for added stability. Every edge is serged to prevent fraying.
  • Quickly blot away spills before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Maya - Pasha Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Highly versatile and oh-so-calming, our Calvin Klein Home Maya Pasha rug offers a restful look and feel courtesy of its transitional design and must-feel combination of silky viscose and cozy wool.

  • Reflective viscose fibers combine with soft wool to create a luxe look and feel for this rug from Calvin Klein.
  • The transitional style and mineral tone of this piece provide a relaxing vibe no matter where they go, from your entryway to your family room.
  • For exceptional comfort underfoot, this power-loomed area rug is crafted with a dense blend of viscose and wool.
  • Before cleaning pet stains, be sure to first absorb as much liquid as possible with a dry paper towel.

Title: Maya - Labradorite Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With modern sensibilities and vintage influence, our Calvin Klein Home Maya Labradorite rug is a talented floor covering that thrives beside any style, especially because of its plush viscose and wool construction.

  • New Zealand wool and shiny, silk-like viscose gran this collection from Calvin Klein a remarkably soft feel.
  • Inspired by vintage designs yet just as at home in contemporary spaces, our traditional-meets-modern beauty has the versatility to go anywhere in your home.
  • Masterfully power-loomed into a high pile of viscose and wool, this lustrous area rug feels exceptionally soft underfoot.
  • To clean light spills or stains on area rugs, simply clean with a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.

Title: Maya - Etched Light Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Shiny and soft, our Calvin Klein Home Maya Etched Light rug boasts an artistic aesthetic that can be either casual or formal, depending on where you place it. Crafted with a blend of viscose and wool, this piece is sure to be a favorite for years.

  • Enjoy the luminous quality of this rug from Calvin Klein that comes from its silky viscose blended with comfy wool.
  • Mineral-inspired tones and a versatile, transitional design with crisscrossing lines make this chic floor covering the perfect accent for your bedroom, office, or laundry room.
  • Our power-loomed area rug has a high pile of viscose and wool yarns for incredible comfort underfoot.
  • Rotate your rug on occasion to even out the effects of repeated foot traffic to certain areas.

Title: Balian - CK-51 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Lend bold visual drama to your favorite spaces with the high-impact Balian CK-51 area rug from Calvin Klein Home. This attractive accent features a rich greyscale palette and deep textural variation, the edges adorned with an inky black border sure to tie any interior arrangement together.

  • The creative Balian collection is constructed with ultra-dense pile adorned with carved lines that make every detail pop with eye-catching emphasis.
  • Use this contemporary rug to underscore living room furniture arrangements, to establish functional spaces like reading nooks, or to create an atmospheric ambiance in a bedroom.
  • Balian collection rugs are machine woven from a combination of silky viscose threads and strong acrylic yarns. Together, these fibers give this blended area rug a luminescent sheen.

Title: River Flow - RFV-05 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Surround yourself with unique elements from floor to ceiling, starting with the bold River Flow RFV-05 Area Rug from Nourison's Calvin Klein Home line.

  • This high-quality area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • With its cracked-stone-like pattern, this abstract area rug is both captivating and contemporary. The background offers eye-catching variations that complete your design scheme in the most dramatic and intriguing way.
  • This flat pile area rug offers a durable latex backing. The low shed, easy-clean, 100% polypropylene rug is versatile and well-made, making it a fine choice for nearly any room in your home.
  • For product longevity, we recommend avoiding the use of a vacuum beater bar on your rug.

Title: Vapor - CK-972 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Give your favorite interior space a strong sense of character all its own with the eye-catching CK-972 area rug from Calvin Klein Home. This piece is part of the luxurious Vapor collection, a series of ultra-modern area rug designs made with irresistible softness sure to delight.

  • Vapor is adorned with bold slash-like striations across a cloudy field pattern, an abstract composition sure to turn heads in any setting.
  • This abstract area rug is available in two colorways, both built upon a neutral palette that allows for creative coordination possibilities. Each one features textural high-low pile that emphasizes every detail.
  • Power-loomed construction ensures excellent clarity and consistency across the Vapor collection. These blended rugs are made with a combination of strong polyester and silky-soft viscose for a radiant sheen.
  • Viscose content rugs perform their best in dry environments. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Professional cleaning is recommended as needed.

Title: Irradiant - IRR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring texture and depth to any space effortlessly with the intriguing Irradiant IRR-01 Area Rug from the Calvin Klein Collection for Nourison.

  • This captivating, modern area rug boasts an overlapping linear pattern that brings abstract, artistic charm to your home. Available in three colorway options, this rug is sure to provide the perfect amount of dimension.
  • Boasting subtle texture variations, this medium pile area rug is commanding and captivating. The 100% polyester area rug is also a low-maintenance and durable choice for any space.
  • Between professional cleanings, we recommend spot cleaning and vacuuming on low to keep your rug looking fresh and beautiful.
  • The stylish area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.

Title: Balance - BLN-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold geometric statement in any room with the wonderfully soft and practical Balance BLN-01 area rug from the Calvin Klein Home collection. This exciting interior accent features a crisp striped pattern worked into a mosaic layout, with every detail emphasized by a carved texture.

  • Balance collection area rugs provide luxurious comfort with family-friendly appeal. Each one resists staining and fading while providing excellent performance in spaces that experience higher levels of foot traffic.
  • Choose from three adaptable colorways, each one easy to coordinate. This borderless contemporary rug offers endless possibilities for creative placement potential – use to anchor a living space, to underscore a dining table, to frame a bed, and more.
  • Each area rug in the Balance collection is power-loomed from a resilient combination of polypropylene and polyester yarns. This strong synthetic rug is backed with latex for added stability. Every edge is serged to prevent fraying.
  • Quickly blot away spills before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting as needed.
